youCanWrite.message: You can write a comment on this PREreview of {preprint}.

orcidLogIn.message: We will ask you to log in with your ORCID iD. If you don’t have an iD, you can create one.

whatIsOrcid.message: An <link>ORCID iD</link> is a unique identifier that distinguishes you from everyone with the same or similar name.

carryOnMessage.message: As you’ve already started a comment on this PREreview of {preprint}, we’ll take you to the next step so you can carry on.

whatNameTitle.message: <error>Error:</error> What name would you like to use?

errorSelectName.message: <error>Error:</error> Select the name that you would like to use

whichNameTip.message: You can choose between the name on your ORCID profile or your PREreview pseudonym.

whatIsPseudonymDefinition.message: A <term>PREreview pseudonym</term> is an alternate name you can use instead of your real name. It is unique and combines a random color and animal. Your pseudonym is ‘{pseudonym}’.

whatIsPseudonymAccountability.message: Using your pseudonym, you can contribute to open preprint review without fearing retribution or judgment that may occur when using your real name. However, using a pseudonym retains an element of accountability.

linkToOrcidId.message: We’ll link your comment to your ORCID iD.

linkToPseudonym.message: We’ll only link your comment to others that also use your pseudonym.

competingInterestsTitle.message: <error>Error:</error> Do you have any competing interests?

errorCompetingInterests.message: <error>Error:</error> Select yes if you have any competing interests

errorCompetingInterestsDetails.message: <error>Error:</error> Enter details of your competing interests

competingInterestsTip.message: A competing interest is anything that could interfere with the objectivity of the comment on a PREreview.

competingInterestsRelationship.message: You have a personal relationship with the author of the preprint.

competingInterestsCompetitor.message: You are a rival or competitor of the author of the preprint.

competingInterestsWorkedWith.message: You have recently worked with the author of the preprint.

competingInterestsWorkPlace.message: You work at the same place the author of the preprint works.

competingInterestsCollaborate.message: You collaborate with the author of the preprint.

competingInterestsPublishedWith.message: You have published with the author of the preprint in the last five years.

competingInterestsGrantWith.message: You hold a grant with the author of the preprint or have other financial ties.

competingInterestsCommenter.message: Any of these same criteria hold true between you and another commenter who has already published a comment on this preprint.

errorFollowingCodeOfConduct.message: <error>Error:</error> Confirm that you are following the Code of Conduct

codeOfConductTip.message: As a member of our community, we expect you to abide by the <link>PREreview Code of Conduct</link>.

expectedBehaviorConstructive.message: Providing feedback that is constructive, i.e. useful, to the receiver.

expectedBehaviorRespectful.message: Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.

expectedBehaviorCommunity.message: Focusing on what is best for the community.

expectedBehaviorEmpathy.message: Showing empathy towards other community members.

unacceptableBehaviorAttacks.message: Trolling, insulting or derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks.

unacceptableBehaviorUnconstructive.message: Providing unconstructive or disruptive feedback on PREreview.

unacceptableBehaviorConfidential.message: Publishing others’ confidential information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission.

unacceptableBehaviorSexual.message: Use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances.

unacceptableBehaviorOther.message: Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.

followingCodeOfConduct.message: I’m following the Code of Conduct

errorEnterValidEmailAddress.message: <error>Error:</error> Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

needToConfirmEmailAddress.message: We’re ready to publish your comment, but we need to confirm your email address first.

emailAddressUse.message: We’ll only use this to contact you about your account and what you publish.

howToVerifyEmailAddress.message: Please open the email we sent to {emailAddress} and follow the link. You’ll then be able to publish your comment.

onceEmailAddressVerified.message: Once your address is verified, you can close this page.

noCompetingInterests.message: The author of this comment declares that they have no competing interests.

nowPublishMessage.message: We will assign your comment a DOI (a permanent identifier) and make it publicly available under a <license>CC BY 4.0 license</license>.

publishingSeeShortlyMessage.message: You’ll be able to see your comment shortly.

publishedSeeShortlyMessage.message: You’ll be able to see your comment shortly.
